messages.title: STOP THE CONSERVATIVES' PLANS FOR A 'DEMENTIA TAX'!
messages.content: The Conservatives want to remove the cap on the cost of care. This would mean millions of people with debilitating illnesses would have to foot the bill for the entire cost of their care.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are leading calls for the Conservatives to axe their 'Dementia Tax' plan. The Lib Dems have a costed plan to give our NHS and social care the boost they need.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to end a 1p income tax to pay for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A Lib Dem vote on 8th June will mean more Lib Dem MPs elected, who will stand up for our NHS and the most vulnerable.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats are calling for the Conservatives to axe their 'Dementia Tax' and have a costed plan to boost NHS and social care.

endorsements.endorsement: Theresa May’s proposal would require elderly people receiving social care to fund the entire cost.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

quotes.text: Theresa May’s proposal would require elderly people receiving social care to fund the entire cost.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

images.caption: Elderly face paying full bill for their care - no matter the cost.
